content.headline: Prioritizing diverse data
content.description: BDC provides access to the highly diverse TOPMed dataset.

content.quote: There’s no comparison; BDC's computation speed is much faster than local resources.
content.attribution: Laura Raffield, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

content.headline: In-demand datasets
content.description: BDC increases access to NHLBI datasets.

content.quote: BDC allows you to do analyses effortlessly and has the infrastructure set up for you.
BDC offers me easier access to data and larger-scale analysis capabilities than I might otherwise have.
